Verses: 1 balavaane, Pollaappil En Perumaipaaraattugiraai? Dhevanudaiya Kirubai Ennaalumulladhu.
2 nee Kedugalaich Seyya Eththanampannugiraai, Kabaduseyyum Un Naavu Theettappatta Savaragan Kaththiyaippol Irukkiradhu.
3 nanmaiyaippaarkkilum Theemaiyaiyum, Yadhaarththam Pesugiradhaippaarkkilum Poiyaiyum Virumbugiraai. (selaa.)
4 kabadamulla Naave, Sangarikkum Sagala Vaarththaigalaiyum Nee Virumbugiraai.
5 dhevan Unnai Endrendraikkum Iraadhapadi Azhiththuppoduvaar; Avar Unnaip Pidiththu, Un Vaasasthalaththilirundhu Pidungi, Nee Jeevanullor Dhesaththil Iraadhapadikku Unnai Nirmoolamaakkuvaar. (selaa.)
6 needhimaangal Adhaik Kandu Bayandhu, Avanaippaarththu Nagaiththu:
7 idho, Dhevanaith Than Belanaaga Ennaamal, Than Selvapperukkaththai Nambi, Than Theevinaiyil Balaththukkonda Manushan Ivandhaan Enbaargal.
8 naano Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Pachchaiyaana Olivamaraththaip Polirukkiren; Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyai Endrendraikkum Nambiyirukkiren.
9 neere Idhaich Seydheer Endru Ummai Endrendraikkum Thudhiththu Umadhu Naamaththirkuk Kaaththiruppen; Ummudaiya Parisuththavaangalukku Munbaaga Adhu Nalamaayirukkiradhu.
